title: Figure Drawing Fundamentals
author: Stan Prokopenko
description: A comprehensive course on drawing the human figure covering gesture, structure, mannequinization, shading, and more.

items.title: How to Draw Gesture
items.description: Gesture is one of the most important principles to understand when drawing the figure. It's not the contour, or the form, or the tone. It's the movement th

items.title: Landmarks of the Human Body
items.description: Landmarks on the body are areas where the bone is at the surface. The landmarks are used to find forms and to measure proportion.

items.title: Mannequinization – Structure of the Human Body
items.description: Learn to draw the figure as a mannequin to give your drawings volume and perspective and to help invent poses from your imagination.
